snippet: A “select handful” of University of Texas applicants are approved at the school president’s direction over the admissions office’s objections, according to an investigation.
abstract: Investigation commissioned by University of Texas Board of Regents finds handful of applicants are approved each year at direction of school president over objections of admissions office; finds instances of such influence peddling by outgoing president William C Powers Jr have grown more numerous in recent years.
lead_paragraph: A “select handful” of University of Texas applicants are approved at the school president’s direction over the admissions office’s objections, according to an investigation.

headline.main: Disputed Admissions at University of Texas
headline.print_headline: Disputed Admissions at University of Texas
